ai-atk-s0402a5:1_1: Second: “A wheel-turning monarch is the first approaching place together with a wheel-turning monarch, a just and so on.”
ai-atk-s0402a5:1_2: And here the two wheel-turning monarchs appear in the attaining of the universal rebirths. There are two kinds of successful meditation.
ai-atk-s0402a5:2_0: being the second wonderful and marvellous,
ai-atk-s0402a5:3_1: In the third place, that is how many people do their duty.
ai-atk-s0402a5:3_2: Herein, a wheel-turning monarch passes away from those who die in the heaven of the world. And who die as well, they think the Buddha’s actions.
ai-atk-s0402a5:4_1: at the fourth moment of the Thūpārāma, in the Sanctuary (of the Shrine),
ai-atk-s0402a5:4_2: For the Wheel-Turning Cetiyas, after birding a shrine terrace, they obtained (the Buddha) three Parinibbāna.
ai-atk-s0402a5:5_0: Pañcasikha’s own conduct, the four Buddhas, and the four noble truths,
ai-atk-s0402a5:6_1: made a sound of the sixth.
ai-atk-s0402a5:6_2: if they are not afraid of wrongdoing,
ai-atk-s0402a5:6_3: Herein, with defilements ended, the defilements don’t give up their own views, identity views, and thoughts.
ai-atk-s0402a5:7_2: (saying): I do not talk about a human being,
ai-atk-s0402a5:7_3: having brought one state of existence, it seems, to the Fortunate One,
ai-atk-s0402a5:7_5: who does not want to talk about the legal procedure.
ai-atk-s0402a5:7_6: Saying, “I’ll give this topic,” he took up two stilt longhouses, lifted them up with a palace.

ai-atk-s0402a5:7_8: Seeing that, what did you do?

ai-atk-s0402a5:7_10: The King said, “How do you take it?”

ai-atk-s0402a5:7_13: The Ambaṭṭha in that place, he saw a fish that was very fruitful and resplendent, and it saw a sal tree.

ai-atk-s0402a5:7_16: When they see a human being in this way, they don’t even call out what was done.

ai-atk-s0402a5:9_1: Eleventh people live together like bad people.

ai-atk-s0402a5:9_10: And if they say that the drum was good: “That’s what I’ve heard, good, and good.”
